types:type.name: Req
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Req = {| name: String, billingAddress: {| street: Null, city: Null, state: Null, postalCode: Null, country: Null |}, shippingAddress: {| street: Null, city: Null, state: Null, postalCode: Null, country: Null |} |} {"example": "{\"name\":\"YG_4\",\"billingAddress\":{\"street\":null,\"city\":null,\"state\":null,\"postalCode\":null,\"country\":null},\"shippingAddress\":{\"street\":null,\"city\":null,\"state\":null,\"postalCode\":null,\"country\":null}}"}

types:type.name: Patchrequest
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Patchrequest = {| id: String, name: String, billingAddress: {| street: Null, city: Null, state: Null, postalCode: Null, country: Null |}, shippingAddress: {| street: Null, city: Null, state: Null, postalCode: Null, country: Null |} |} {"example": "{\"id\":\"001S000000zSBPqIAO\",\"name\":\"YG_4\",\"billingAddress\":{\"street\":null,\"city\":null,\"state\":null,\"postalCode\":null,\"country\":null},\"shippingAddress\":{\"street\":null,\"city\":null,\"state\":null,\"postalCode\":null,\"country\":null}}"}
